mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.user_id AS "user.id", a.shop_user_name AS "shopUserName", a.phone AS "phone", a.arear AS "arear", a.address_detail AS "addressDetail", a.is_default AS "isDefault", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", u2.name AS "user.name"
LEFT JOIN sys_user u2 ON u2.id = a.user_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO shopping_address( id, user_id, shop_user_name, phone, arear, address_detail, is_default, create_date, update_date, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{user.id}, #{shopUserName}, #{phone}, #{arear}, #{addressDetail}, #{isDefault}, #{createDate}, #{updateDate}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE shopping_address SET user_id = #{user.id}, shop_user_name = #{shopUserName}, phone = #{phone}, arear = #{arear}, address_detail = #{addressDetail}, is_default = #{isDefault}, update_date = #{updateDate} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM shopping_address a WHERE a.user_id = #{userId} and del_flag = 0
